mapper.sql: id, user_id, source_type, expend_score, expend_detail, udp_time
mapper.insert: insert into dd_score_outflow (id, user_id, source_type, expend_score, expend_detail, udp_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expendScore,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{expendDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{udpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
